name: sustainability-tss-podcast
description: Converts web articles to podcast episodes using Google Cloud TTS

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy sustainability-tss-podcast --gen2 --runtime=nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region=europe-west2 --source=. --entry-point=generatePodcast --service-account=971698071276-compute@developer.gserviceaccount.com --set-env-vars=GCS_BUCKET_NAME=sustainability-podcast,USE_CLOUD_STORAGE=true,GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT=hippo-ideas,FUNCTION_URL=https://europe-west2-hippo-ideas.cloudfunctions.net/sustainability-tss-podcast --timeout=540s --memory=1024MB && npm run refresh
